actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the rates of duty for montan wax.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to impose a customs duty of 6 1/2 cents per pound on unrefined montan wax and to allow the free entry of other montan wax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Tariff Schedules of the United States with respect to the rates of duty for montan wax.
